SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT012
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This is an optional feature in the FINCopy service. It notifies the sender when the message has been released by the service administrator. The MT 012 is an LT-directed message. As such, it will be sent to the logical terminal which sent the original user-to-user message
From: FIN To: User

SystemField.Name: input-time
SystemField.description: Local to the sender, of the original user message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFT Network is in GMT.

SystemField.Name: mir
SystemField.description:
Message input reference of the sender's Copy message, that has been copied to and released by the service administrator. It contains:
a) Input date
b) Input LT including branch code
c) Session number
d) ISN

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mir
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Message input reference of the sender's Copy message, that has been copied to and released by the service administrator. It contains:
a) Input date
b) Input LT including branch code
c) Session number
d) ISN

SystemField.Name: mur
SystemField.description: Contains one of the following: 1.MUR as used in the header of the original message if present. 2. If no message user reference was present in the original message, this tag may contain the contents of field 20 of the original message or (for Category 5 messages only) the contents of field 20C, with the code word SEME. Tag 108 with only blanks (spaces) is accepted by the system.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: mur
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Message User Reference as used in the header of the original message

SystemField.Name: swift-address
SystemField.description: Complete 12-character destination, including logical terminal code and branch code, of the message that was sent.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: swift-address
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Complete 12-character address, including LT code and branch code, or default branch code of the message that was sent..

SystemField.Name: payment-release-information-sender
SystemField.description: Information from service administrator to sender of payment message.Tag 114 with only blanks (spaces) is accepted by the system.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: payment-release-information-sender
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Information from server destination to sender of payment message..
